title: How to unsubscribe from CDA Premium
description: CDA Premium is a subscription service offered by CDA.pl. To cancel your CDA Premium subscription, follow these steps:

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your CDA Premium subscription, follow these steps:

*   Log in to your account on CDA.pl.
*   Select "CDA Premium" from the menu on the left (marked in orange).
*   Click the "Anuluj subskrypcjÄ™" (Cancel Subscription) button.
*   Confirm the cancellation to stop future billing.
*   Check your email for a confirmation of cancellation.

seo_text: Cancel your CDA Premium subscription easily by following our step-by-step guide. Learn how to stop recurring payments and manage your CDA Premium account.
